diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +500,504 @@     * the given client is followed by the set of tasks that are not caught-up on the given client does NOT hold.
     * In fact, in this test, at some point during the execution of the algorithm the assignment for CLIENT_2
     * contains TASK_34 followed by TASK_23. TASK_23 is caught-up on CLIENT_2 whereas TASK_34 is not.
     */
    @Test

comments.body: There are no logical changes to this file, just factoring out the `statefulTasksToRankedCandidates` and supplying the `tasksToCaughtUpClients` as an additional input parameter
